name: Jam Dungeon
description:
Gameplay

  Jam Dungeon is a game where each level obstacles, enemies and items appear in different random locations, your mission is to find 7 golden jams but it won't be easy! Be careful not to run out of jam, if you run out of jam, you die!

Comments
  1. This game relies heavily on luck, so the game will often feel unfair.
  2. This game was made in 3 days for a Game Jam so I didn't have a lot of time to do something polished
  3. I hope you enjoy :D
Credits
  1. Sounds made by www.littlerobotsoundfactory.com
  2. Music made by Juhani Junkala
  3. Victory music made by congusbongus
